thread.title: Competition: win an unforgettable driving break
thread.title_full: Competition: win an unforgettable driving break - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Competition: win an unforgettable driving break
text: Win a driving break in the UK and create your own extraordinary driving tale. With three prizes available, three lucky winners will be able to enjoy a fantastic driving trip. Here's what you could win: 1st prize: family glamping trip • Take your family off to the stunning Cotswold for a luxury 7 nights glamping trip at Moor Farm • Stay in a canvas lodge for a unique camping experience the whole family will love • The amazing prize includes car hire, fuel allowance and a private chicken coop so you can pick you own eggs every day plus a breakfast hamper to get you started 2nd prize: weekend on the Jurassic Coast • Take yourself and your partner off on a weekend driving along the Jurassic Coast - England's first natural World Heritage Site • Stay for two nights in the Alexandra Hotel, providing magnificent views overlooking the Lyme Regis Bay and the Jurassic Coast • This amazing prize includes car hire, fuel allowance and champagne on arrival 3rd prize: weekend in the Peak District • Take yourself and your partner off on a weekend driving through the beautiful Peak District • Stay for two nights at the four-star Callow Hall Country House Hotel situation in the Derbyshire Dales and Peak District • The amazing prize includes return travel for two people and breakfast each morning in the hotel restaurant To be in with a chance of winning one of the fantastic prizes above, simply complete the form below. All entries must be received by midnight on Sunday, November 22, 2015 . Online Form - Competition: win an unforgettable driving break
